thing.title: MakerBot Y-Assembly Small Parts
thing.author: MaskedRetriever
thing.description: Continuing my efforts to 3D-ify the MakerBot, I've got most of the Y-assembly parts.The build platform isn't on here as that would just be entirely too existential.Also it'd prrrobably be slightly smaller than we want. (Time for a special Extra Large MakerBot, guys?)
